option.name: description
option.value: Universal lines sort with all kinds of features

option.name: modelData
option.value: <SortSettings> <option name="baseComparator" value="NATURAL" /> <option name="collatorLanguageTag" value="en_US" /> <option name="groupClosingLineRegex" value="^[\s]*[)\]}],?[\s]*$" /> <option name="groupClosingLineRegexEnabled" value="true" /> <option name="groupSeparatorRegex" value="(^[\s]*$|^---.*$)" /> <option name="hierarchicalSort" value="false" /> <option name="ignoreLeadingCharacters" value="//" /> <option name="ignoreLeadingCharactersEnabled" value="false" /> <option name="ignoreLeadingSpaces" value="true" /> <option name="jsonSort" value="false" /> <option name="levelRegex" value="^[\s]+" /> <option name="preserveLeadingSpaces" value="true" /> <option name="preserveTrailingSpecialCharacters" value="false" /> <option name="sortByGroups" value="false" /> <option name="sortType" value="CASE_INSENSITIVE_A_Z" /> <option name="trailingChars" value=",;" /> </SortSettings>
